snippet: For all his renown as the bad boy of Chinese art, precious little of Ai Weiwei's work has been seen in the outside world. An exhibit at the Jeu de Paume aims to change that.
abstract: For all his renown as the bad boy of Chinese art, precious little of Ai Weiwei's work has been seen in the outside world. An exhibit at the Jeu de Paume aims to change that.

headline.main: The Weiwei Way on View in Paris
